column4: Can anyone tell me how to change the language of my ubuntu. He's speaking norwegian and that bugs me :)
when you log in there is an option to change language (if you have it installed)
if you need to install a language, go to system->administration->language support (thats in english - you will need to transalte into the current language)
when you type in your username/password... there is an options button on the bottom
